# opnsense_nginx_settings (Resource)

Manage OPNsense Nginx plugin general settings.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ban_ttl` (Number) Ban duration in seconds before a blocked client is released.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Enable the Nginx plugin service.
